test_cases.notes: POST /api/services works; POST /api/availability validates slot duration matches service.
GET /api/availability now accepts service_id query parameter; frontend uses it correctly.
Booking flow works; backend prints confirmation email; frontend shows confirmation ID.
PUT /api/appointments/{id} uses AppointmentUpdate model allowing status/slot_id changes.
GET /api/appointments triggers reminder logic (prints to console) for appointments 24-48h ahead.

summary: All high/medium priority user stories implemented. Core booking, availability filtering, double-booking prevention, and basic reminders work.
recommendations: Implement persistent database storage instead of in-memory.
Add authentication for admin endpoints (US001, US002).
Enhance calendar view (US005) with date filtering on GET /api/appointments.
Implement actual email sending instead of console prints.
Add customer history view (US006) via GET /api/customers/{id}/appointments.
